name: Summer Chicken Burgers
author: Elisa Gale
summary: These grilled chicken sandwiches are mouthwatering! Great for backyard get-togethers.
ingredients: 1 large Vidalia onions, sliced into rings
4  breast half, bone and skin removed (blank)s boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
directions: In a small bowl, combine sliced avocado and lemon juice
Add water to cover; set aside
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil grate
Heat butter in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat
Saute the onions until browned and caramelized; set aside
Season the chicken with salt and pepper
Place on grill, and cook until no longer pink and juices run clear, about 5 minutes on each side
Place buns on grill just long enough to toast them
Spread buns with mayonnaise to taste, then layer with chicken, caramelized onion, provolone and avocado
